Azure.ResourceManager.CommonTypes.Tracke.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager tracked top level resource which has 'tags' and a 'location'

Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceProvisioni.description: The provisioning state of a resource type.

Experiment.description: A model representing the Footprint experiment.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ExperimentListResult.description: The response of a Experiment list operation.

value.description: The Experiment items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ExperimentProperties.description: A model representing the Footprint Experiment resource.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

experimentId.description: The id of a Footprint experiment.

description.description: The description of a Footprint experiment.

status.description: The status of a Footprint experiment.

MeasurementEndpoint.description: Name of the Footprint measurement endpoint resource.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

MeasurementEndpointCondition.description: A model representing the Footprint Measurement Endpoint Condition resource.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

MeasurementEndpointConditionListResult.description: The response of a MeasurementEndpointCondition list operation.

value.description: The MeasurementEndpointCondition items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

MeasurementEndpointConditionProperties.description: A model representing the Footprint Measurement Endpoint Condition resource.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

conditionId.description: The id of a Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

type.description: The type of a Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

variable.description: The variable of a Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

operator.description: The operator of a Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

constant.description: The constant of a Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

MeasurementEndpointListResult.description: The response of a MeasurementEndpoint list operation.

value.description: The MeasurementEndpoint items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

MeasurementEndpointProperties.description: A model representing the Footprint Measurement Endpoint resource.

endpointId.description: The id of a measurement endpoint.

description.description: The description of a measurement endpoint.

endpoint.description: The value of a measurement endpoint.

measurementType.description: The type of a measurement endpoint.

weight.description: The weight of a measurement endpoint, higher weight means higher priority.

experimentId.description: The id of an experiment that a measurement endpoint is part of.

objectPath.description: The path of the object that a measurement endpoint points to.

conditions.description: The conditions of a measurement endpoint.

startTimeUtc.description: The start time that a measurement endpoint should be served.

endTimeUtc.description: The end time that a measurement endpoint should be served.

hotPathSamplingPercentageRate.description: The sampling rate, in percent, for the hot path logging of a measurement endpoint.

warmPathSamplingPercentageRate.description: The sampling rate, in percent, for the warm path logging of a measurement endpoint.

coldPathSamplingPercentageRateOverride.description: The sampling rate, in percent, for the cold path logging of a measurement endpoint.

metadata.description: The metadata of a measurement endpoint.

Operator.description: The operator of a Footprint measurement endpoint condition.

values.name: IsExactValue
values.description: The condition is an exact value.

values.name: MatchValueIgnoreCasing
values.description: The condition is a match value ignore casing.

values.name: ContainsValue
values.description: The condition is a contains value.

values.name: ContainsValueIgnoreCasing
values.description: The condition is a contains value ignore casing.

values.name: DoesNotContainValue
values.description: The condition is a does not contain value.

values.name: DoesNotContainValueIgnoreCasing
values.description: The condition is a does not contain value ignore casing.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ProfileListResult.description: The response of a Profile list operation.

value.description: The Profile items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ProfileProperties.description: A model representing the Footprint profile resource.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

profileId.description: The id of the Footprint profile.

description.description: The description of the Footprint profile.

startDelayMilliseconds.description: The delay in milliseconds that the clients should wait for until they start performing measurements.

scriptUri.description: The URL where the script for the Footprint profile.

measurementCount.description: The number of measurements to perform.

coldPathSamplingPercentageRate.description: The default sampling percentage for cold path measurement storage.

measurementEndpoints.description: The endpoints which to perform measurements to.

reportingEndpoints.description: The endpoints which to upload measurements to.

experiments.description: The experiments currently associated to this Footprint profile.

description.description: The description of the Footprint profile.

reportingEndpoints.description: The endpoints which to upload measurements to.
